full_summary:
**Multiple Victoria-Class Spares Tender Notification**
==============================================

**Title**: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares: Supply of Various Items for Repair and Maintenance
**Reference Number**: cb-191-79046716
**Solicitation Number**: W8482-241779/A
**Publication Date**: March 13, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: May 17, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST

**Introduction**
---------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the supply of various spares for repair and maintenance of Victoria-Class vessels. This tender is Malaysia-STAN database and is open internationally.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The scope of this tender includes the supply of twelve (12) items, including:

* 2 x Motor Pilot Valve Repair Kits (NSN: 20-A0Z0725)
* 2 x Non-Metallic Grommets (NSN: 99-5801448)
* 2 x Centrifugal Fans (NSN: 99-7222570)
* 2 x Amberlite IRN 150 (NSN: 20-A0Z0565)
* 2 x Amberlite IRN 150 (NSN: 20-A0Z0565)
* 2 x Bearings, Ball, Annular (NSN: 01-5637418)
* 2 x Centrifugal Fans (NSN: 99-7275720)
* 1 x Retainer, Packing (NSN: 99-5602615)
* 1 x Set Screw (NSN: 99-1225489)
* 1 x Fan, Centrifugal (NSN: 99-7275719)

**Delivery Locations**
-------------------

Items must be delivered to the following locations:

* CFB Esquimalt
* CFB Halifax

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

The selection criteria for this tender is Lowest Price.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is open to bidders participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada
